Lyrics: Ubi caritas et amor, Deus ibi est.
Poetic Translation: Where both charity and love are, God is present, too.

Lyrics: Congregavit nos in unum Christi amor.
Poetic Translation: We are made one by the perfect love of Jesus.

Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: And in Him let us be joyful and contented.
Let us fear and let us love the God who lives on.

Lyrics: Et ex corde diligamus nos sincero.
Poetic Translation: May we love each other frankly and sincerely.

Lyrics: Ubi caritas et amor, Deus ibi est.
Poetic Translation: Where both charity and love are, God is present, too.

Lyrics: Simul ergo cum in unum congregamur:
Poetic Translation: All the while we are united in one body,
Careful lest we be divided in our spirit.
Evil impulses and strife must discontinue,

Lyrics: Et in medio nostri sit Christus Deus.
Poetic Translation: And may Christ in His holiness be among us.

Lyrics: Ubi caritas et amor, Deus ibi est.
Poetic Translation: Where both charity and love are, God is present, too.
With the saints who came before us may we one day
Look upon Your face in glory, Christ our ruler,

Lyrics: Gaudium quod est immensum, atque probum,
Poetic Translation: Joy above joy that is good, immense and boundless,
Lasting all through an infinity of ages.
